scripts.compile-user-protos: mkdirp generated/user && pbjs -r domain -t static-module -w commonjs --no-encode --no-decode --no-verify --no-convert --no-delimited protos/user/user_domain.proto -o generated/user/domain.js && pbts --no-comments -o generated/user/domain.d.ts generated/user/domain.js && pbjs -r api -t static-module -w commonjs protos/user/user_api.proto -o generated/user/api.js && pbts --no-comments -o generated/user/api.d.ts generated/user/api.js
scripts.compile-core-protos: mkdirp generated/core && pbjs -r domain -t static-module -w commonjs --no-encode --no-decode --no-verify --no-convert --no-delimited protos/core/core_domain.proto -o generated/core/domain.js && pbts --no-comments -o generated/core/domain.d.ts generated/core/domain.js && pbjs -r api -t static-module -w commonjs protos/core/core_api.proto -o generated/core/api.js && pbts --no-comments -o generated/core/api.d.ts generated/core/api.js
scripts.build: npm run compile-desc && npm run compile-user-protos && npm run compile-core-protos && tsc && cp -r generated dist
scripts.docker:publish: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:push
